title: Great Experience
text: Hey guys, it's an absolute honor for me to give a testimonial for Kerala students on Onam festival. As an institution, we always feel privileged to have diverse people and diverse cultures. As a student, during their course of 4 years, we learn a lot more about cultures and people from different celebrations and functions. We celebrated Onam in our 2nd year at Sri Shanmugha Institutions. I wish you guys all the best for this wonderful celebration. It was an amazing event last year. Thanks to the entire team of coordinators who made the event successful. I'm looking forward to this wonderful event.
name: Thirumoorthy Arumugam

title: Great Experience
text: Aarmadam’24 was a remarkable celebration that highlighted the cultural diversity, unity, and enthusiasm of Sri Shanmugha. With students leading every detail, it became an unforgettable experience of joy and togetherness. As we look forward to Asthra’25, the anticipation is even greater, and the name itself sparks much curiosity—I’m truly excited to witness the spirit of Onam come alive once again.
name: Gokila Shanmugham

title: Great Experience
text: Aarmadham’24 set a great benchmark as Sri Shanmugha College’s first Onam celebration — the student participation was simply remarkable. With Asthra’25 around the corner, I’m eager to see the celebrations grow bigger and better, with our continued support.
name: Safeer N

title: Great Experience
text: Armadam 2024, Sri Shanmugha College’s first grand Onam, lit up with cultural programs, traditional attire, pookalam, Thiruvathira, music, games, and payasam—creating unforgettable festive memories.
name: Munna Shaheem P

title: Great Experience
text: Aarmaadham'24 was indeed a highlight of my Onam experiences so far! Shanmugha's enthusiasm and energy are infectious, and I'm looking forward to Asthra'25 being another memorable celebration!
name: Fathima Jinan

title: Great Experience
text: Armadam 2024 at Sri Shanmugha College turned Onam into a vibrant festival of unity, blending traditions, cultural shows, games, and joy into unforgettable moments.
name: Muhammed Shadhil

title: Great Experience
text: Last year’s Onam was truly special. From the colorful pookkalam to everyone in traditional attire, the festive spirit made it feel like one big family. What I cherished most was the joy of sitting together, sharing laughter, and celebrating our togetherness.
name: Wafa

title: Great Experience
text: Armadam 2024, by the 2021–2024 batch, was Sri Shanmugha College’s first grand Onam, with pookalam, Thiruvathira, performances, games & payasam—uniting all in joyous celebration.
name: Fadal
